dialogues.speaker: Aria
dialogues.text: Look! The sun is rising, it①fs going to be a wonderful day.

dialogues.speaker: Aria
dialogues.text: Look! The sea is crashing, we can feel the power of it.

dialogues.speaker: Finn
dialogues.text: I guess so. But first, let①fs get to it.

dialogues.speaker: Aria
dialogues.text: Always the practical one, aren②ft you?  Alright, let③fs get to it.

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: And so, their day began, full of chores, but also full of potential for adventure.
